abstract.p: Correction of listing of financial advice programs for the serious ill that ran with a Nov 16 article on a cancer survivor's efforts to save money

block.p: A listing of financial advice programs for the seriously ill last Sunday, with an article about a cancer survivor's efforts to save money, referred incorrectly to a developer of one such program, which should be available to patients and their families sometime in 1998. The American Cancer Society is working on the program with the National Endowment for Financial Education, not the College for Financial Planning.

A listing of financial advice programs for the seriously ill last Sunday, with an article about a cancer survivor's efforts to save money, referred incorrectly to a developer of one such program, which should be available to patients and their families sometime in 1998.
